EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Customer when Lead is Closed
EmailTemplate.name: RetailSMB_LeadClosed_Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Australia Post
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
We are pleased to inform you that your enquiry has now been resolved.
Your reference number is {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}.
Thank you for using our service.
If you have any additional enquiries, please contact us at customerservice@auspost.com.au or visit your local Post Office.
Thank you,
Australia Post
